Review.Titre: Didn’t receive all my orders
The subwoofer is properly grounded…
Review.Contenu: The subwoofer is properly grounded properly wired and it doesn’t work at all highly dissatisfied ….update ….1day later I got a response from the review from toro that I’m supposed to ground the amplifier not the subwoofer? Well it’s an amplified subwoofer so same thing , hot ,remote ground and rca are all in its place and have 3 other “amps” installed on the highs I’ve been installing radios amps and alarms 25+ years bottom line is the toro “amplified subwoofer” let me be correct, is a dud period. Fuse is lit with no bang it’s a firecracker that doesn’t pop

Review.Titre: I ordered 1 amp along with the remote…
Review.Contenu: I ordered 1 amp along with the remote gain kit and a pair of high level input plugs. All items arrived okay, but I’ve sent 2 emails to Toro Tech with a couple simple questions and have not heard back.  Not impressed with the customer service so far.

Review.Titre: You mesd up my orders I got just 2 …
Review.Contenu: You mesd up my orders I got just 2  speakers had to contact you but you have told me you have sent the rest I hope it's right ....was looking to buy a extra set crossovers but I  can't find them on your web page thanks ....Any how thanks for your time I hope it all works out

Review.Titre: My amp does not work and I haven't got…
Review.Contenu: My amp does not work and I haven't got a response from them its a does not feel good paying for something waiting for it and getting and it doesn't work

Review.Titre: Other than the fact that it took almost…
Review.Contenu: Other than the fact that it took almost 5 months to get issued my refund which was supposted to be cash but was given store credit by mistake, and after 3 months of not hearing from anyone not at least given my money back I was owed as a courtesy for waiting so long and still being forced to accept store credit, I was also criticized for using the toro.support email address instead of thr toro.service email in my desperation to hrar back from the company after 3 months of no responses from anything, including a phone number that does nothijg but call a 3rd party who tells you to use the email address they weren't responding too.

Review.Titre: cheap amps
Review.Contenu: cheap amps, both price and quality

Review.Titre: non-responsive
Review.Contenu: the product is great but customer service is nonexistent. i have asked a question 3 times with no response

Review.Titre: Is what it is.
Review.Contenu: Reason being it took multiple days to even ship. The label was made and it took 3-4 days to start shipping. I thought this product was going to come from toro and it came from Amazon. If I knew that I would of ordered prime instead. Reason I didn't in the first place because I am a basshead that believes in supporting the audio companies and not just looking for the cheapest way possible. And I almost garuntee that the packaging will not be up to audio standards. Amazon usually throws stuff in the nearest size box and calls it good. Where audio companies make the boxes fit the product.Plus as it sits right now today I do not have my product yet. I know covid is hurting companies and I hope things go back to normal or close to it. Nothing against toro I can't wait till I get to hear the product.

Review.Titre: I have been trying to communicate by…
Review.Contenu: I have been trying to communicate by sending emails and I’ve yet to get a response. I placed my order over the weekend and still haven’t  received any shipping update.

Review.Titre: Birth certificate has factory rms…
Review.Contenu: Birth certificate has factory rms ratings. Nothing tested. Amp is no where near its factory rated power. Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Great products, Poor Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I love this amplifier, gives me great bass, but the customer service is is very poor and needs great improvement. They need to learn to listen to their customers.

Review.Titre: I ordered the fierce 8 with the MR2…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the fierce 8 with the MR2 amp.  The sub is great but after hooking up the amp I found that it didn't work.  It comes on but doesn't produce any sound from it.

Review.Titre: I really wanted this to be a good…
Review.Contenu: I really wanted this to be a good review but after only a couple hours and the first ride amp started to cut out and at first it was only at high volume but now it is at all times. Not sure why but I guess for $100 what did I expect.

Review.Titre: Dis satisfied of performance of latest…
Review.Contenu: Dis satisfied of performance of latest amp purchase and follow up. I have had other mich better products and experiences

Review.Titre: Bought a 300W amp...got 200W
Review.Contenu: Bought a 300W amp...got 200W. If it wasn't $49 with a coupon, I would return it. I guess that's how Toro makes their money. Don't waste your time on their "SQ" amp...nobody is using this for SQ. I didn't give it 1 star because...well...it does work, and it doesn't cut out like the Boss amp it replaced. I didn't expect much for the price, but Toro didn't need to lie about it's power rating

Review.Titre: Fierce 8” and Rage r2
Review.Contenu: I’ve built large competition quality stereos over the years... the specs on the fierce 8 looked pretty impressive. I build a custom box 1.1 cu ft and either the fierce 8 isn’t what numbers say or the rage r2 isn’t as strong as it’s numbers claim... but all in all I spent $158 on sub and amp another $30 for mdf to achieve a little better than factory bass... BUT! it looks good.... This is for the toro response ... it’s not the box the crossover on ur mono rage r2 is sub par. I was sponsored by JL Audio in the late 90’s early 2000’s I put their rd 500/1 on the 8’s and they pound like the numbers say they should... should possibly think of a better crossover and add in a clip feature... I’ve also submitted photos of the install to ur instagram so u could see them mounted on a 2019 Jeep Wrangler tailgate... just search the same name as on here if ur interested in how they turned out

Review.Titre: I wasn’t impressed my JL 250 pushes…
Review.Contenu: I wasn’t impressed my JL 250 pushes more watts but what do you expect from a 79 dollar amp wouldn’t even push my 12s

Review.Titre: MRx4 DOA
Review.Contenu: MRx4 new ? 2 of the 4 channels not working

Review.Titre: I didn’t like the fact that I placed my…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t like the fact that I placed my order early on Wednesday and payed for two day shipping and I’m not get the product till Monday 4 days later

Review.Titre: I purchased a rage rx2 back in…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a rage rx2 back in February, and now just a couple weeks past warranty the amplifier is generating unwanted noise. I tried switching cables and re wiring everything yet the noise remains. My Skar audio amplifiers which were purchased over a year ago are having zero issues. I replaced the rx2 with a crappy blaukpunt I have, and all unwanted noise in the system is gone. I ran the.amp at moderate levels, and as stated my amps from other manufacturers are producing zero issues. So you lost two stars due to product dependability, if I would've known I was only getting a 90 day warranty at purchase, I would of just bought an amp from another manufacturer.

Review.Titre: Great responses
Review.Contenu: Great responses. Fast shipping. Unbeatable price.However I'm not sure why the RX4 amp is listed online as a 65watt/channel unit when the box it came in advertises 75watts. I would like Toro to communicate why this is, and especially which power output the unit ACTUALLY has.Also for both my amps, the QC card that came in them were blank, leading me to believe both my units are untested. Seems sloppy, Toro.

Review.Titre: Ordered some subs said they were in…
Review.Contenu: Ordered some subs said they were in stock. After a day or so got and email saying they were out of stock and wouldn’t be back in for 40 days. Not that big of deal just mostly disappointing.

Review.Titre: Dont chabge your mind!
Review.Contenu: Product seemed very good quality. Didnt gst to listen. I went a different route. The only negative is make sure this is the sleaker uant beccause Toro does not pay for return shipping. Cost me $40  to return. So mow im out $40 on a $100 speaker. Still waiting to see if they have any issues with my return. Update. Return went good. No issues!

Review.Titre: Toro really needs a customer service…
Review.Contenu: Toro really needs a customer service line that you can actually talk to a real live human. Someone that can answer tech questions or just purchase information

Review.Titre: They got to me pretty quick
Review.Contenu: They got to me pretty quick. I got the extend insurance on them but unfortunately house burnt and speakers were inside. They don't cover fire so I'll get them again and may the next ones will make it in the truck

Review.Titre: Product not received yet nor any…
Review.Contenu: Product not received yet nor any shipping info as far as I only nothing has happened except me paying for it

Review.Titre: Price doubled
Review.Contenu: The only thing that happened is how the prices jumped to almost double from wat I paid jus last yr for the same product. That’s way to high but I still bought it based on keeping the same brand.

Review.Titre: Was excited to work with toro audio…
Review.Contenu: Was excited to work with toro audio ordered the R6 amp (before they changed it to 3200 rms) and 2 force 12 got everything in a timely manner only to be disappointed months later after trying to get their retro sponsorship took videos photos even got tons of likes on my photos they would post only to contact them and they keep giving me the run around then didn't even want to help when I blew one of the subs

Review.Titre: The subwoofers a good outstanding…
Review.Contenu: The subwoofers a good outstanding products recently purchased an amplifier and I'm having troubles out of it found that the RCA inputs on an amp the nuts we're loose only reason why I found it it's cuz my amp is making like a static noise through the speakers change the RCA's still got the same issue and the amp is not working correctly contacted a few people at Toro and right now I haven't heard back from anyone so their customer service and my opinion sucks love the product though

Review.Titre: I am not really sure what is going on
Review.Contenu: I am not really sure what is going on. I have the amplifier mounted in the same location as the factory amplifier in my 2002 suburban. with no amplifier installed my JVC picked up radio stations excellent. When the amplifier comes on the FM reception is terrible. Is the power supply interfering with the antenna? When I hold the amp in front of the glove box away from the dash FM reception is great again!

Review.Titre: Still waiting for my order
Review.Contenu: Still waiting for my order.  Hard to give a review Without seeing their product in person

Review.Titre: Good quality
Review.Contenu: Good quality, GREAT price! What more can you ask for!?

Review.Titre: Just what I needed
Review.Contenu: Got the extra power I needed

Review.Titre: Good boom for buck
Review.Contenu: I was a little upset, I was expecting a little more from the slim 10” sub. But I haven’t heard many other slim 10” subs, so that may be normal, but for the price it’s impossible to beat. Also, the build quality seems top notch.

Review.Titre: I Received my Product and they Sound…
Review.Contenu: I Received my Product and they Sound Great I would Definitely Recommend Family and Friends to Toro

Review.Titre: I keep getting emails to urge me to…
Review.Contenu: I keep getting emails to urge me to review this. I installed it and the rms output powers my slightly smaller rms speakers great. The small size of this allowed for more areas to hide it and I would buy it again based on space saving.  However I have an alternator whine in my speakers now, so I'm trying to troubleshoot that with a power filter or capacitor.

Review.Titre: I love the Toro subs I haven't had a…
Review.Contenu: I love the Toro subs I haven't had a chance to get the amps yet are there any anything like the subs I like them a lot and I love showing them off cuz nobody knows about them what is that total like a lawn mower LOL nope way better

Review.Titre: Fast shipment but sent email on whether…
Review.Contenu: Fast shipment but sent email on whether i got the right items and no return or proper response.  That left a bad taste in my mouth.  I'll be doing a heads up test of woofers on my YouTube account.

Review.Titre: I would recommend this product for…
Review.Contenu: I would recommend this product for anyone trying to find bass in very small packages this is the thing gets down for a little is I could’ve sworn there’s no way but that little thing producers quite a bit of bass pushing 15 inch Cadence

Review.Titre: Good quality product,
Review.Contenu: Good quality product,Very reasonable price,Ez nav on the site,Check out was a breeze. Good job guys.

Review.Titre: Received my purchase quickly
Review.Contenu: Received my purchase quickly, exactly what I needed

Review.Contenu: Item packaging could improve.Overall I am happy with the items and my clients are too.I have personally installed in my Jeep a MR4 and MR2 and love themon clients rides I have done MR4 MR2 MR3 they love them.

Review.Titre: I have a pair of R6's which I'm…
Review.Contenu: I have a pair of R6's which I'm extremely  happens with and I've been doing this car audio thing for over 15 years I've use massive audio,orions HCCA line crossfire MTX ,to name a few and this product is as good most of them and better then some of the top names I truly believe in the toro product

Review.Titre: Love the size!
Review.Contenu: Love the size!! Decent power!!  Pulls a lot of power from my motorcycle battery though!  Only complaint!!

Review.Contenu: Hopefully mine is not damaged because the shipping box was ok but the manufacturer box was unopened damaged

Review.Titre: Better Packaging
Review.Contenu: Everything's good but somebody needs to work on their packaging.

Review.Titre: I had made a purchase to 6 1/2 inch…
Review.Contenu: I had made a purchase to 6 1/2 inch subwoofers Fierce The only bad thing I did not like about it was when I install the subs into subwoofer box the ties that Holden 10 gauge it against the box so make it a real tight fit other than that everything was great made a custom box that sounds really good for being 6 1/2 inch subwoofers

Review.Titre: I love your microamps especially the…
Review.Contenu: I love your microamps especially the two and four channel I sure would like to see your 2,000 and 1/2 ohm 4,000 amps on a bench test broadcasted on YouTube pretty simple send your apps over they'll test them to this some curiosity there why not throw in the basement come on that's a pain in the butt I'm running in 2000 mono amp for my bass 3 2 channel microamps plus 2 4 channel micro amps. I would have loved to have a zero gauge input on my mono amp I know it does more than my RP 1500 and it seems relatively efficient get those benches out there pushing 2000 for two bills that's a pretty sweet deal 0 gauge inputs into the basement come on

Review.Titre: Works as advertised
Review.Contenu: Works as advertised . Ups dropped the ball on the 2 day shipping. But otherwise no complaints sounds great. Toro four channel class ab

Review.Titre: Excited to try out the brand Ordered 2…
Review.Contenu: Excited to try out the brand Ordered 2 micro 4 channel amps for my harley. Shipping company lost them. Not toros fault. Contacted customer service.  They responded and are working on a resolution. I will update  once I install them. They will be replacing rockford fosgate pbr300-4

Review.Titre: Fast shipping
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping, the sub woofer I ordered is exactly as described, super happy with powered sub

Review.Titre: First time knowing your company
Review.Contenu: First time knowing your company. Was impressed with the quality of your products. Took a chance an purchased a Toro10 1500w RMS sub. Then purchased a 1600w mono block Amp. Hoping it will arrive soon! I will review when installed. Thank you for your products an savings.

Review.Titre: Toro 8" (Fierce) Subwoofer is better than some 10"s and 12"s of other brands
Review.Contenu: Pretty fast shipping and the subwoofer sounds amazing for an 8". I have 1 in a ported box right now and it slams but I ordered a second one from them so I'm going to run 2 8"s in a ported box and I think it's going to be insane. These subwoofers are 15lbs because they have a huge magnet on them and in the description it says that they have a carbon fiber pulp cone.

Review.Titre: I'm very happy with every toro product…
Review.Contenu: I'm very happy with every toro product I've bought, from a couple of their mono & 4 channel amps that I put in my family members vehicles to their force 12s subwoofer that i run in my own vehicle off an ab2900 deaf bonce amplifier that feeds it about 3000 watts rms, yet can't seem to make it distort at all cause it's build quality is amazing. Toro makes very good products

Review.Titre: First time buying toro
Review.Contenu: First time buying toro audio and maaan I am blown away by the quality/performance. Fast shipping. Definitely hooked will buy again A+

Review.Titre: Incredible bang for the Buck
Review.Contenu: I've had some really nice sound systems in my life. One of my favorites was ADS mid to high end car audio. I found Toro on line and read the reviews and decided to give them a try. I couldn't be happier the range and detail is awesome.

Review.Titre: A perfect match amplifier and…
Review.Contenu: A perfect match amplifier and subwoofers!! They sound AWESOME!! I would definitely recommend them to everyone because they get low and loud. I out them in a 4th order subwoofer enclosure and WOW those 2 Fierce 8's sound just as maybe some way sound better than my 3 10's sundown subwoofers!! Thank you Toro for making such  awesome product's!!!

Review.Titre: ABOVE AND BEYOND!
Review.Contenu: You guys went above Amy beyond for me. I will never recommend any other type of Amp to my friends and family after the awesome customer service I received! Thank you guys! Ill order move foe other vehicles in the future. Thank you for standing by your product well after the warranty expired. Company's like you are hard to find these days, keep up the good work!

Review.Titre: Toro makes excellent audio products &…
Review.Contenu: Toro makes excellent audio products & they've also warranties things for me no issues at all with their customer service

Review.Titre: F6K 6.5 Components system
Review.Contenu: Toro Tech always kept me informed on my shipping which was fast the F6K components are awesome they sound great in my Kia sportage. Definitely worth every penny great package deals will buy from again as my project goes on THANKS TORO TECH

Review.Titre: My husband is a true DeVoe bass head
Review.Contenu: My husband is a true DeVoe bass head! I introduced him to Toro a year ago and he purchased a 12s force with an R5 amp then bought another set. When I drive down the street playing the radio no one ever believes that's only a 12 beating in the back of our QX4. So in turn I decided to treat myself by buying 4, 10 fierce and a r5 amp to go with the r5 I all ready have. I can't wait to have an installed and see people's reaction. Although they're just becoming known these speakers are put together with great quality and there's a staff member at Toro by the name of Jeremy great customer service if ever you have a problem that's the guy to look to.

Review.Titre: I bought the 12 fierce and r5 amplifier…
Review.Contenu: I bought the 12 fierce and r5 amplifier package because I wasn't able to afford the force 12s yet I say yet because , I will soon.. I can't wait to hear what the force 12 s sound like after hearing these fierce 12 because they hit hard. I mean hit hard , especially for the price range they will blow your mind.  However I have to upgrade my alternator and wiring due to the amount of current the r5 draws, which only means its going to take even longer for me to save for a pair of the force 12s. Lol but seriously I would recommend toro to anyone looking for great audio on a budget. Totally worth the money and fast delivery.

Review.Titre: Im not being compensated in any way…
Review.Contenu: Im not being compensated in any way shape or form for for this review. 100% honesty. 5 out 5 stars. I was hesitant about ordering this brand but went against my gut and ordered anynow. Upon first installing my sub it didnt sound like anything different from skar or kickers but i ended up getting a custom built box for the sub tuned at 33hz and i now on only 2550w have both windshields flexing. Dont hesitate and buy instantly! My money will forever be with them

Review.Titre: Gdk car audio installation
Review.Contenu: I was able to catch the sale. I would definitely Put some more padding in the boxes my box was damaged. Other than that, I love my new speaker. I'm going to order another one soon.

Review.Titre: #1 products and customer service!!
Review.Contenu: I got the subs unbelievably fast. Packaging was a little lean. The products on the otherhand are fat! These little subs have an 18”subwoofer complex! They slam!! Its a 6” sub that thinks its alot bigger!  The most important thing is the company! I have never been treated so well by a company. They listen and care about keeping the customer happy!! Customer service and the communication from these people is top shelf!! Believe me if there’s an issue they will jump through hoops to rectify it. Thank you guys for being a standup company and offering legitimate quality items to the public. I am now a lifetime customer.

Review.Titre: I kept seeing advertisements for this…
Review.Contenu: I kept seeing advertisements for this company here and there and the look of the product had me interested rite away. I put it off and put it off, and finally I went ahead and ordered two fierce 15s, and I couldn't be happier with the performance and quality. Thank you Toro tech audio for your quality work, and perfect customer service..

Review.Titre: Awesome product
Review.Contenu: Awesome product! I purchased the Fierce 8" 400w RMS subwoofer and put it in a custom birch box tuned to 38 hz with a dedicated 350w RMS class d monoblock amp and am super impressed. Sounds like a gorilla trying to get out the back of my suburban. Keep making products like this and I will be a loyal customer for life.

Review.Titre: I've currently made two purchases from…
Review.Contenu: I've currently made two purchases from Toro, one has arrived, well packaged and prompt. The second has not arrived yet but I suspect the same care in packaging. Will definitely continue to order from them. Great product and outstanding customer service. You've made a customer for life.

Review.Titre: 12 inch TORO subs
Review.Contenu: I think they are beautiful subs definitely get what you pay for definitely quality subs I love the red spider I like the stiffness the one thing I don't like much are the direct leads I think those would be awesome on the bigger subs with the 3-inch voice coil but not the 2.5 VC ones but I think some push leads would be better I think everything else except for the direct leads is Great 🤙🏼

Review.Titre: The equipment I have purchased this far…
Review.Contenu: The equipment I have purchased this far is all phenomenal. Excellent competition quality for a damn good price and had all my orders within 3 days. Love the Force 122's and the R6 & R5 amps are bangin ass amps. Will definitely be purchasing more. Thanks Toro Tech!!

Review.Titre: I've now purchased 3 subwoofers and 3…
Review.Contenu: I've now purchased 3 subwoofers and 3 different amplifiers and loved everything about them. My Friend Milo John is killing it promoting and selling Toro products all over the state of Washington.  Toro for the WIN!!!

Review.Titre: Toro is awesome
Review.Contenu: Just wanted to send this review ...Jeremy went way way way over and above the call to help me out, it was completely my mistake yet they sent me a very very discounted replacement which I totally appreciate and I am very thankful for...  Honesty is appreciated and these guys are a very awesome company.

Review.Titre: SUPRISED AS HELL WHAT THIS AMP IS DOING!!
Review.Contenu: Ok so ive been what did you try one of these amplifiers for quite a while every time I go to get one they've always been out of stock well this time they were having to be in stock so I got some R5 and got it installed and everything and I'm running to 15 inch Skar DDX has a dual voice coil 2 ohm subs I have it wired the to 2 ohms and it is just beating the subs I mean it just pound them. I had my gains all set with an oscope so theres no distortion at all and all signals are clean. This amp has by all means has surpassed the expectations that I had for it. So good job TORO! Ill looking at getting a 4 channel amp from you guys later this month to run my mids and Highs.

Review.Titre: TORO Fierce 6
Review.Contenu: TORO Fierce 6    This subwoofer is great would be happy to purchase more in the future. Free air bench test had pictures on the walls rattling. Its much heavier then it looks and you can alse see the quality and craftsmanship that went into the design and construction. 10/10

Review.Titre: I have all Toro Tech in my SUV…
Review.Contenu: I have all Toro Tech in my SUV Component speaker's, Slim 10 Sub, & Amplifier I have to say I was very Impressed with the sound crisp & clear & the slim 10 hits hard very satisfied definitely will tell family and friendsThanks Toro TechJerry

Review.Titre: Love the quality
Review.Contenu: Arrive in a timely matter

Review.Titre: The pricing and product are both…
Review.Contenu: The pricing and product are both fantastic, However the Force 12s was sold out I wish you had them available so i could buy them to !

Review.Titre: TORO IS THE BEST
Review.Contenu: I've had the Toro 12 inch force series 2000 watt rms subwoofer for almost 1 year now and they have surpassed Skar 100x I've never been happier with the quality of these subs.. not only that ive never heard of toro before so i was rolling the dice with them and bought 2 . I had bought these when they were like 350$ if I'm not mistaken.. now they are 800 $I really don't care I'd still by these subs

Review.Titre: Great product at a good price
Review.Contenu: Great product at a good price. Made in the USA. Amp does what it says it will do. Have great response and a lot of configurations to adjust parameters

Review.Titre: Good deal on Toro Audio
Review.Contenu: Was looking to replace a older amp but I didn't have a lot of space or had the space to give up for my stereo. Was actually looking at another brand when I saw a YouTube review on this brand. Love the small size and they're on sale (at the time of this review) which really helped with my choice of getting them.  1 MRx4 & 2 MR3.

Review.Titre: Toro is awesome at shipping fast
Review.Contenu: Toro is awesome at shipping fast. When they say 2-6 days, they really mean 2-3 days. Website is easy to navigate, and there are a ton of ways to pay or finance making it extremely affordable.

Review.Titre: Toro subs are all I use for my car…
Review.Contenu: Toro subs are all I use for my car subwoofer needs.great price,the power they can handle,how they sound,they are unbeatable especially at there price range.I should know I have 8 8" tier e su s and I need to get 4 more,so I'll no where I'll be going. And there customer service is top notch.they go way beyond what they need to,to satisfy their custom ERS.Toro rocks

Review.Titre: Just got the R6 mono block....

Review.Titre: Quality, features, and performance!
Review.Contenu: The quality, features, and performance you provide at the low price point is what sets you apart from the competition. Keep being awesome Toro Tech!

Review.Titre: Im only buying Toro from now on
Review.Contenu: Been a long time fan of kicker for a long time. Was looking to upgrade my amp and purchased the Toro R5 to power a kicker 12 Qclass. Learned real quick this amp was the real deal and could easily push that speaker to it's max with very little trouble. Even wired it in series to 4ohm as I feared to blow the speaker. Decided to upgrade to a Toro Force 12s and just wow. Speaker is still being broke in but only expect greater gains once I give it a few weeks to really start to push it. The difference between Kicker and Toro is night and day. You guys have another Toro customer for life.

Review.Contenu: Ordered two of the same amps accidentally. Toro customer service called and verified before sending two amps and having to go through return process. Very pleased.

Review.Titre: I Really Like your Blog
Review.Contenu: I liked your blog very much your way of writing is very different which makes your blog great I have learned a lot from you thank you for giving such a good article I am also a blogger my site name is Tech Nelofar if you want  Do see him once.

Review.Titre: Excellent quality audio products
Review.Contenu: Excellent quality audio products. This lil amp makes my speakers sound loud and crispy clear. Fast shipping.

Review.Titre: Toro Fierce & MBEnclosures is the YouTuber
Review.Contenu: MBEnclosures is the YouTuber, that put me on to the Toro Fierce 8 in subs and all the other products you guys sell. if it wasn't for his reviews on how the speakers play how they sound the price if they're worth buying, I would have never known about your company nor would I have purchased the four fierce 8"Subs I have now. The way they play and sound and they look, especially for the price you have it for right now, is basically a steel.Unbelievable price.They perform with the best of them up there, and give all these top brands speakers a run for their money. That's why I purchase the subs before the original price kicks in,and you know what,they are still well worth it. I might even buy four more Fierce 8 in subwoofers if my wife lets me. For anyone thinking about buying these speakers don't wait too long they won't last at this price and they'll be sold out soon enough.they are better than 5 stars,more like 10 stars

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: Great customer service. Quality and price cannot be beat. Get your self some of this great equipment , a great new name in car audio world. Bar Nunn holds up better than most brand name amps.

Review.Titre: Upgrade
Review.Contenu: I couldn’t wait to get my subs compared to the ones I had and I made the box to there Measurements they sound good I’m gone have to tweak there measurements but over all its great I plan to upgrade later on down the road

Review.Titre: Great sound from the Toro woofers
Review.Contenu: Great sound from the Toro woofers. I was pleasantly impressed with the level of bass the 6.5s provided with under the seat ported enclosure in my SuperDuty.

Review.Titre: Stop shopping around and buy these already!!!
Review.Contenu: I was looking for new subs and came across a brand I had never heard of but was interested in hearing them. So I took a leap of faith and grabbed a pair of Toro Fierce 12” that I ended up getting off of Facebook marketplace used and was very impressed by the sound quality, and I have gone through so many different subs and brands. As a matter of fact, I was bumpin down the road and a guy Next to me and me all over so he could check out the system and then offered to purchase it, said he had never heard of them and now a big Toro fan after I sold him that set up. And of course after I sold them I just had to upgrade my Toro’s and went with a pair of Fierce 12s’s. Have em hooked up now in a generic box that is crap, AND THEY STILL SOUND AMAZING!! I am in the process of designing a tuned box to fit my 2014 Jeep JKU and I can’t wait to finish it cuz I’m ready to really rattle some brains!! haha    The leap of faith paid off for me! Toro’s build quality speaks for itself, I could go on and on about it but once you actually hear the quality!!! Your brain is boggled by the insane thumps and responsiveness of em!! Definitely a customer for life!

Review.Titre: The power source  holes could be bigger…
Review.Contenu: The power source  holes could be bigger but for the size of that amp it pushes plenty of power to my four 6x9s and two tweeters for a beautiful combo

Review.Titre: Bought a toro 12 inch 1500 watt rms for…
Review.Contenu: Bought a toro 12 inch 1500 watt rms for my lifted show truck. So far so good. I am still in the break in period so haven't thrown any hard volume to it yet. Looks good and sounds good so far. Packaging was top notch for long term travel. I build trucks for SEMA and my stereo is the next upgrade. Will probably look here for a bigger amp and the rest of the truck speakers.

Review.Titre: Great quality and USA made
Review.Contenu: Website was easy to navigate and am super happy with the quality so far. I love the power in the small dimensions and best of all it’s built in the USA

Review.Titre: You can't lose with this brand.
Review.Contenu: I took a gamble on my first order which was the 8 inch force subs. I order 2 of them and was blown away at how good they are and well put together. They pound like a champ for some 8s. So I order another and I'm starting a new build for my bmw. Going to be running 3 of these on a 5k RE amp. Toro is way under rated. They need to be up there with the top dogs if you ask me. And the price is mind blowing. Under price for some top notch product. I see this brand going to a good place for sure. Love what y'all are putting out Toro.

Review.Titre: Quality on a budget?!?
Review.Contenu: Amazing! Very sturdy and high quality feeling. I wasn’t sure what to expect, but when I received it I was blown away. When I got it put in I was even more impressed with how much power it packs in such a small package!

Review.Titre: The shipping was great the special…
Review.Contenu: The shipping was great the special promo price was great I purchased in the past and they we're a really good price but then you guys went up in price but the 4th  of July special prices we're really good so I had to jump in while I could afford to get them at a deal sound is awsome no complaints

Review.Titre: So far very happy
Review.Contenu: The product came on time, looks nice, and so far is working very well. I am happy I decided to go with this amp. So far I think for the price it was a good choice. The quality seems good and is doing the job running my 6x9s. I will continue to look into Toro products in the future.
